price: Yεde no wuraa Y’ahummͻborͻ no mu. Nokorε sε na ͻka apapafoͻ no ho.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
